attributes.action: Stop hitting U.K citizens with more taxes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Taxes in this country are becoming out of control, every week there is something else added, it should not be allowed, think of the british citizens for once.

rejection.details: There are several existing petitions around this theme. Please consider signing one of those before opening a new petition.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
